DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Anatomic Site Facility Oncology Registry Data Standards Surgical Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Records the type of definitive surgical procedure performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used._Named locations of or within the body.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Named locations of or within the body.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: Named locations of or within the body.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Model owner approved releasing this DEC 5/26/10.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Facility Oncology Registry Data Standards Site Specific Surgical Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories that represents coding for site specific surgical procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Facility Oncology Registry Data Standards Site Specified Surgical Code
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A coding manual produced by the Commission on Cancer of the American College of Surgeons that provides definitions and detailed instructions for coding patient diagnosis, treatment, and outcome.:Position in relation to the surroundings.:Specified; clearly and explicitly stated.:of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A coding manual produced by the Commission on Cancer of the American College of Surgeons that provides definitions and detailed instructions for coding patient diagnosis, treatment, and outcome.
A position in relation to its surroundings.
of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
